name: Debugger (yudev)
description: Hi! This is the second game that I made using Unity. Its a 2D top-down shooter game where you play as a programmer that kills bug. After almost 3 months of learning Unity, I'm finally uploading my first game with an idea that I have came up with.  I will be making more better games in the future.Thank you for playing in advance I hope you'll enjoy it.
